name: Hostel Inhabitant
description:
Hostel Inhabitant is a game created by ty, art by pionponpon, and music by Ferkeshu. It was for the RPG Horror Celebration Jam #2. This game is a prototype and was only able to develop the tutorial (Chapter 1 - Strangers). Happy Halloween! You may find this game a treat, or may receive a trick (press F5 if something is busted).

How To Play

A - move left

D - move right

Spacebar - jump

W - interact

Hold A/D - run left/right

U/I - enter inventory mode and cycle left/right to select an item

J - Use equipped item

J - Fire equipped weapon

J (Inventory Mode) - Equip selected item

K (Inventory Mode) - Pocket selected item

Hold K - Combine equip with pocket item

Hold K (Pocket is Empty) - Disassemble equipped item

K - swap equip and pocket items for quick access

N (Inventory Mode) - Drop selected item

N - Pick up an item

N (No items nearby) - Quick drop equipped item

Double Tap A/D - dash left/right
